comments_message: Dear John: Attached are a copy of the draft response we received from Jones, Day and copies of the correspondence and Intervenor's Motion for Hearing on Settlement Notice filed with the Court by Eric Olsen. I will fax the latest version of the proposed notice to you when it is received. Nicola
confidentiality_notice: The documents accompanying this telecopy transmission contain confidential information belonging to the sender which is legally privileged. The intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on the contents of this telecopied information is strictly prohibited. If you have received this in error, please notify us immediately.
